verses.verse: Now after<WG3326> these things,<WG5023> the Lord<WG2962> also<WG2532> appointed<WG322> seventy<WG1440> others,<WG2087> and<WG2532> sent<WG649> them<WG846> two<WG1417> by<WG303> two<WG1417> ahead<WG4253> of him<WG846> <WG4383> into<WG1519> every<WG3956> city<WG4172> and<WG2532> place,<WG5117> where<WG3739> <WG3757> he<WG3195> <WG846> was<WG3195> about to come.<WG2064>

Then<WG3767> he<WG3004> said to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "The harvest<WG2326> is indeed<WG3303> plentiful,<WG4183> but<WG1161> the laborers<WG2040> are few.<WG3641> Pray<WG1189> therefore<WG3767> to the Lord<WG2962> of the harvest,<WG2326> that<WG3704> he may send out<WG1544> laborers<WG2040> into<WG1519> his<WG846> harvest.<WG2326>
Go your<WG5209> ways.<WG5217> Behold,<WG2400> I<WG1473> send<WG649> you<WG5209> out<WG649> as<WG5613> lambs<WG704> among<WG3319> wolves.<WG3074>
Carry<WG941> no<WG3361> purse,<WG905> nor<WG3361> wallet,<WG4082> nor<WG3366> sandals.<WG5266> <WG2532> Greet<WG782> no one<WG3367> on<WG2596> the way.<WG3598>
<WG1161> Into<WG1519> whatever<WG3739><WG99999> house<WG3614> you enter,<WG1525> first<WG4412> say,<WG3004> <WG1515> 'Peace be to<WG3624> this<WG5129> house.<WG3624>'

<WG2532> If<WG1437><WG99999> a son<WG5207> of peace<WG1515> is<WG5600> there,<WG1563> your<WG5216> peace<WG1515> will rest<WG1879> on<WG1909> him;<WG846> but if<WG1487> <WG1161> not,<WG3361> it will return<WG344> to<WG1909> <WG344> you.<WG5209>

<WG1161> Remain<WG3306> in<WG1722> that same<WG846> house,<WG3614> eating<WG2068> and<WG1161> drinking<WG4095> the things<WG3588> <WG3844> they<WG846> give,<WG3844> for<WG1063> the laborer<WG2040> is<WG2076> worthy<WG514> of<WG3408> his<WG846> wages.<WG3408> Don't<WG3361> go<WG3327> from<WG1537> house<WG3614> to<WG1519> house.<WG3614>
<WG2532> Into<WG1519> whatever<WG1161> <WG1161> city<WG4172> you enter,<WG1525> and<WG2532> they receive<WG1209> you,<WG5209> eat<WG2068> the things that are set before<WG3908> you.<WG5213>
<WG2532> Heal<WG2323> the sick<WG772> who are therein,<WG846> and<WG2532> tell<WG3004> them,<WG846> <WG932> 'The Kingdom of God<WG2316> has come near<WG1448> to<WG1909> you.<WG5209>'

But<WG1161> into<WG1519> whatever<WG3739><WG99999> city<WG4172> you<WG5209> enter,<WG1525> and<WG2532> they don't<WG3361> receive<WG1209> you,<WG1831> go out into<WG1519> its<WG846> streets<WG4113> and say,<WG2036>

<WG2532> 'Even the<WG2868> <WG2532> dust<WG2868> from<WG1537> your<WG5216> city<WG4172> that clings<WG2853> to us,<WG2254> we wipe off against<WG631> you.<WG5213> Nevertheless<WG4133> know<WG1097> this,<WG5124> that<WG3754> the Kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> has come near<WG1448> to<WG1909> you.<WG5209>'
I<WG1161> tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> it<WG3754> will be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> in<WG1722> that<WG3754> day<WG2250> for Sodom<WG4670> than<WG2228> for<WG4172> that<WG1565> city.<WG4172>

"Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG4671> Chorazin!<WG5523> Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG4671> Bethsaida!<WG966> For<WG3754> if<WG1487> the mighty works<WG1411> had been done<WG1096> in<WG1722> Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605> which were done<WG1096> in<WG1722> you,<WG5213> they would<WG302> have<WG3340> repented<WG3340> long ago,<WG3819> sitting<WG2521> in<WG1722> sackcloth<WG4526> and<WG2532> ashes.<WG4700>
But<WG4133> it will be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> for Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605> in<WG1722> the judgment<WG2920> than<WG2228> for you.<WG5213>
<WG2532> You,<WG4771> Capernaum,<WG2584> who are exalted<WG5312> to<WG2193> heaven,<WG3772> will be brought down<WG2601> to<WG2193> Hades.<WG86>

Whoever listens<WG191> to you<WG5216> listens<WG191> to me,<WG1700> and<WG2532> whoever rejects<WG114> you<WG5209> rejects<WG114> me.<WG1691> Whoever<WG1161> rejects<WG114> me<WG1691> rejects<WG114> him who sent<WG649> me.<WG3165>"

The<WG1161> seventy<WG1440> returned<WG5290> with<WG3326> joy,<WG5479> saying,<WG3004> "Lord,<WG2962> even<WG2532> the demons<WG1140> are subject to<WG5293> us<WG2254> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> name!<WG3686>"
He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "I saw<WG2334> Satan<WG4567> having fallen<WG4098> like<WG5613> lightning<WG796> from<WG1537> heaven.<WG3772>

Behold,<WG2400> I give<WG1325> you<WG5213> authority<WG1849> to tread<WG3961> on<WG1883> serpents<WG3789> and<WG2532> scorpions,<WG4651> and<WG2532> over<WG1909> all<WG3956> the power<WG1411> of the enemy.<WG2190> <WG2532> Nothing<WG3762> <WG3756> will<WG91> in any way<WG3361> hurt<WG91> you.<WG5209>

Nevertheless,<WG4133> don't<WG3361> rejoice<WG5463> in<WG1722> this,<WG5129> that<WG3754> the spirits<WG4151> are subject to<WG5293> you,<WG5213> but<WG1161> <WG3123> rejoice<WG5463> that<WG3754> your<WG5216> names<WG3686> are written<WG1125> in<WG1722> heaven.<WG3772>"

In<WG1722> that<WG846> same hour<WG5610> Jesus<WG2424> rejoiced<WG21> in the Holy Spirit,<WG4151> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> "I thank<WG1843> you,<WG4671> O Father,<WG3962> Lord<WG2962> of heaven<WG3772> and<WG2532> earth,<WG1093> that<WG3754> you have hidden<WG613> these things<WG5023> from<WG575> the wise<WG4680> and<WG2532> understanding,<WG4680> and<WG2532> revealed<WG601> them<WG846> to little children.<WG3516> Yes,<WG3483> Father,<WG3962> for<WG3754> so<WG3483> it was<WG1096> well-pleasing<WG2107> in<WG1715> your<WG4675> sight.<WG1715>"

Turning to the disciples,<WG3956> he said, "All things have been delivered<WG3860> to me<WG3427> by<WG5259> my<WG3450> Father.<WG3962> No<WG2532> one<WG3762> knows<WG1097> who<WG5101> the Son<WG5207> is,<WG2076> except<WG1487> <WG3361> the Father,<WG3962> and<WG2532> who<WG5101> the Father<WG3962> is,<WG2076> except<WG1487> <WG3361> the Son,<WG5207> and<WG2532> he to<WG1437> whomever<WG3739> the Son<WG5207> desires<WG1014> to reveal him.<WG601>"
<WG2532> Turning<WG4762> to<WG4314> the disciples,<WG3101> he said<WG2036> <WG2596> privately,<WG2398> "Blessed<WG3107> are the eyes<WG3788> which see<WG991> the things that<WG3739> you see,<WG991>

for<WG1063> I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> that<WG3754> many<WG4183> prophets<WG4396> and<WG2532> kings<WG935> desired<WG2309> to see<WG1492> the things which<WG3739> you<WG5210> see,<WG991> and<WG2532> <WG1492> didn't<WG3756> see<WG1492> them,<WG2532> and to hear<WG191> the things which<WG3739> you hear,<WG191> and<WG2532> <WG191> didn't<WG3756> hear them.<WG191>"

<WG2532> Behold,<WG2400> a certain<WG5100> lawyer<WG3544> stood up<WG450> and<WG2532> tested<WG1598> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "Teacher,<WG1320> what<WG5101> shall I do<WG4160> to inherit<WG2816> eternal<WG166> life?<WG2222>"
He said<WG2036> to<WG4314> him,<WG846> "What<WG5101> is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the law?<WG3551> How<WG4459> do you read it?<WG314>"

<WG1161> He<WG2036> answered,<WG611> <WG2036> "You shall love<WG25> the Lord<WG2962> your<WG4675> God<WG2316> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> your<WG4675> heart,<WG2588> <WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> your<WG4675> soul,<WG5590> <WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> your<WG4675> strength,<WG2479> and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> your<WG4675> mind;<WG1271> and<WG2532> your<WG4675> neighbor<WG4139> as<WG5613> yourself.<WG4572>"
He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "You have answered<WG611> correctly.<WG3723> Do<WG4160> this,<WG5124> and<WG2532> you will live.<WG2198>"
But<WG1161> he,<WG2036> desiring<WG2309> to justify<WG1344> himself,<WG1438> asked<WG2036> <WG4314> Jesus,<WG2424> <WG2532> "Who<WG5101> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> neighbor?<WG4139>"

<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG5274> <WG2036> "A certain<WG5100> man<WG444> was going down<WG2597> from<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2419> to<WG1519> Jericho,<WG2410> and<WG2532> he fell<WG2007> among<WG4045> robbers,<WG3027> who<WG3739> both<WG2532> stripped<WG1562> him<WG846> and<WG2532> beat<WG4127> him,<WG2532> and departed,<WG863> leaving<WG2007> him half dead.<WG5177>

<WG1161> By<WG2596> chance<WG4795> a certain<WG5100> priest<WG2409> was going<WG1722> down<WG2597> that<WG1565> way.<WG3598> When<WG2532> he saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> he passed by on the other side.<WG492>
In<WG1161> the<WG2532> same<WG3668> way a Levite<WG3019> also,<WG1096> when he came<WG2064> to<WG2596> the place,<WG5117> and<WG2532> saw<WG1492> him,<WG492> passed by on the other side.
But<WG1161> a certain<WG5100> Samaritan,<WG4541> as he<WG846> traveled,<WG3593> came<WG2064> where<WG2596> he<WG846> was.<WG2596> When he saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> he was moved with compassion,<WG4697>

came<WG2532> to<WG4334> him,<WG2611> and bound up his<WG846> wounds,<WG5134> pouring on<WG2022> oil<WG1637> and<WG2532> wine.<WG3631> He<WG3631> set<WG1913> him<WG846> on<WG1909> his own<WG2398> animal,<WG2934> and brought<WG71> him<WG846> to<WG1519> an inn,<WG3829> and<WG2532> took care of<WG1959> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> On<WG1909> the next day,<WG839> when he departed,<WG1831> he took out<WG1544> two<WG1417> denarii,<WG1220> and gave<WG1325> them to the host,<WG3830> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> <WG1959> 'Take care of him.<WG846> <WG2532> Whatever<WG5100><WG99999> you spend beyond<WG4325> that,<WG302> I will repay<WG591> you<WG4671> when<WG1722> I<WG1473> return.<WG1880>'
Now<WG3767> which<WG5101> of these<WG5130> three<WG5140> do you<WG4671> think<WG1380> seemed<WG1096> to be a neighbor<WG4139> to him who fell<WG1706> among<WG1519> the robbers?<WG3027>"

He<WG1161> said,<WG2036> "He who showed<WG4160> mercy<WG1656> on<WG3326> him.<WG846>" Then<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Go<WG4198> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> <WG4771> likewise.<WG3668>"

It<WG1161> happened<WG1096> as<WG1722> they<WG846> went<WG4198> on their way,<WG2532> he<WG846> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> a<WG2968> certain<WG5100> village,<WG2968> and<WG1161> a<WG1135> certain<WG5100> woman<WG1135> named<WG3686> Martha<WG3136> received<WG5264> him<WG846> into<WG1519> her<WG846> house.<WG3624>
She<WG3592> had<WG2258> a sister<WG79> called<WG2564> Mary,<WG3137> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> sat<WG3869> at<WG3844> Jesus<WG2424>' feet,<WG4228> and heard<WG191> his<WG846> word.<WG3056>

But<WG1161> Martha<WG3136> was distracted<WG4049> with<WG4012> much<WG4183> serving,<WG1248> and<WG1161> she came up to him,<WG2186> and said,<WG2036> "Lord,<WG2962> <WG3199> don't<WG3756> you<WG4671> care<WG3199> that<WG3754> my<WG3450> sister<WG79> left<WG2641> me<WG3165> to serve<WG1247> alone?<WG3441> Ask<WG2036> her<WG846> therefore<WG3767> to<WG2443> help<WG4878> me.<WG3427>"
<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> her,<WG846> <WG2036> "Martha,<WG3136> Martha,<WG3136> you are anxious<WG3309> and<WG2532> troubled<WG5182> about<WG4012> many things,<WG4183>

but<WG1161> one thing<WG1520> is<WG2076> needed.<WG5532> <WG1161> Mary<WG3137> has chosen<WG1586> the<WG3310> good<WG18> part,<WG3310> which<WG3748> will<WG851> not<WG3756> be taken away<WG851> from<WG575> her.<WG846>"
